description: For a while I have not been able to connect my computers to each other on my wireless network and I haven't got to the bottom of it yet. I was having to transfer files between them with a USB flash drive. I installed wormhole and it works pretty good. Although a little knowledge of using a terminal is required, it is not complicated.

Yeah this soge is malware
^^^^^ THIS
			IS MALWARE 
^^^^^^^	--tabs in ubuntu??
------------------------------
GDJKSGNBHLNL;

I love being able to copy a file from one computer to another, anywhere in the world, without email, without a flash drive, without a file service (DropBox, Google Drive, etc.), and without even worrying about the OS on the source and destination computer. As long as you can get the "magic" password to the destination computer, it just works. A very handy utility to have in your toolbox.
summary: It's simple and it just works!

description: Epic, works really well, would be good if you could send over folders instead of one file at a time.
summary: great app, very useful and cool idea

description: Use this all the time to move files between devices. Never had any issues.
A terminal opens very briefly, gone in a flash. Nada.
Für die größere Mengen von Datenvolumen: einmalig!!
безопасно переносить данные с одного компьютера на другой
summary: безопасно переносить данные с одного компьютера на другой
